description: The public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has posted a TENDER, on behalf of the Ministry of the National Defence Department (DND) for the acquisition of firefighter training systems. Interested parties are invited to submit proposals, according to the terms and conditions outlined in the solicitation document.
full_summary:
### RFP for Fire Extinguisher Training Systems

[Title in French and English]: W0106-22J012 - Request for Proposal for the Acquisition of Fire Extinguisher Training Systems (DDP Simulateurs d'extincteurs d'incendie)

**Solicitation Number:** WS3662774781

**Publication Date:** October 25, 2022

**Closing Date:** November 10, 2022 (14:00 Eastern Standard Time)

**Type of Opportunity:** Request for Proposal - Competitive

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Applicable Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Location of Delivery:** Québec, Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu and Montréal

**Contact Information:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Telephone: [Not provided]
* Email: [patrick.beaupre@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:patrick.beaupre@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence is issuing this Request for Proposal for the acquisition of Fire Extinguisher Training Systems. All relevant information, including the bid submission requirements, is available in the solicitation document.

**Bid Submission Guidelines:**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by 14:00 HNE (Eastern Standard Time) on November 10, 2022.
* Late bids will not be considered.

**Access the Solicitation:**

You can access the solicitation document at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14264514?extsite=MTQyNjQ1MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14264514?extsite=MTQyNjQ1MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The lowest price will be used as the evaluation criteria.
